df <- data.frame(date_time = c(as.POSIXct("2018-01-01 00:00:00"), rep(NA,13499)))
library(lubridate)

df<-df %>% mutate(date_time = date_time[1] + seconds(row_number()-1))

z <- read.zoo(all[,c(1,3)]); z
plot(z)

tt <- as.ts(z); tt

tt3 <- ts(c(tt), start = start(tt), freq = round(frequency(tt))); tt3
